title: Create a Cohort Analysis Report
description: An analyst wants to understand customer retention by creating a cohort analysis report that shows the percentage of new users who return in subsequent months.

tasks.description: In the analytics tool, create a cohort analysis report.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent navigates to and sets up the cohort report.

tasks.description: Define the cohort by 'Acquisition Date' and the metric as 'User Retention'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sets the correct parameters for the analysis.

tasks.description: Analyze the resulting table to see how retention changes over time for different cohorts.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies trends, such as 'The May cohort had higher Month 1 retention than the April cohort.'
